system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision radio button. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_radio_button_i.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_button_imp.xml#f_init_select_actionsinit_select_actions redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_button_imp.xmlEV_BUTTON_IMP export {NONE} ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object {../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget undefine ../implementation_interface/ev_radio_button_i.xml#f_default_alignmentdefault_alignment redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make, ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_makemake, ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_new_gtk_buttonnew_gtk_button end
../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_peer_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_PEER_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create radio button. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_new_gtk_button../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_new_gtk_buttonnew_gtk_button: FalsePOINTER do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_radio_button_newgtk_radio_button_new (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_nullnull) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current do ../implementation_gtk/ev_button_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor ../implementation_gtk/ev_button_imp.xml#f_align_text_leftalign_text_left ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_enable_selectenable_select end
feature -- Status report
f_is_selected../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is toggle button pressed? do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_toggle_button_get_activegtk_toggle_button_get_active (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) end
feature -- Status setting
f_enable_select../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_enable_selectenable_select -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected True. do if not ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_is_selectedis_selected then {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_toggle_button_set_activegtk_toggle_button_set_active (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, True) end end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_widget_object../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_widget_objectwidget_object (a_list: FalsePOINTER): FalsePOINTER -- Returns c_object relative to a_list data. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gslist_struct_datagslist_struct_data (a_list) Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_struct_parentgtk_widget_struct_parent (Result) end
f_radio_group../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_radio_groupradio_group: FalsePOINTER -- Reference to front of radio group. *GSList. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_radio_button_groupgtk_radio_button_group (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_radio_button.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_radio_button_imp.xmlEV_RADIO_BUTTON_IMP
